title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rally after Russia reports pullback of military troops - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rally after Russia reports pullback of military troops  Yahoo Finance
description: Wall Streetâ€™s main benchmarks rallied on Tuesday as investors weighed a potential de-escalation of geopolitical tensions between Russia and Ukraine following news some Russian military units will start returning to their permanent bases after completing drills near the Ukrainian border.
